sentences.en: All great songs are informed by a certain sadness and tension.
sentences.cn: 所有很棒的歌曲都透着某种悲伤和张力。

sentences.en: All that money brought nothing but sadness and misery and tragedy.
sentences.cn: 那笔钱带来的只有伤心、痛苦和悲剧。

sentences.en: As the evening progressed, sadness turned to rage.
sentences.cn: 随着夜幕逐渐降临，悲伤变成了愤怒。

sentences.en: He felt a great sadness for this little girl.
sentences.cn: 他为这个小女孩深感悲哀。

sentences.en: He let out a long sigh, mainly of relief, partly of sadness.
sentences.cn: 他长叹一口气，主要是因为如释重负，也有一部分是因为伤心。

sentences.en: Her homecoming was tinged with sadness.
sentences.cn: 她这趟回家带有一丝伤感。

sentences.en: Her novels are infused with sadness.
His relief was tinged with sadness (= he also felt rather sad ) .
sentences.cn: 他的欣慰中带着一丝哀伤。

sentences.en: I felt sick to my stomach with sadness for them.
sentences.cn: 我为他们感到十分痛心。

sentences.en: Levin sat there, an expression of sadness on his face.
sentences.cn: 莱文坐在那里，神情悲伤。

sentences.en: The old building had an intangible air of sadness about it.
sentences.cn: 那座旧建筑笼罩着一种说不出的悲凉气氛。

sentences.en: The old building had an intangible air of sadness about it.
sentences.cn: 那座古老建筑物周围笼罩着说不出的凄凉气氛.

sentences.en: There was a terrible sadness in her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她眼神中流露出深深的悲伤。

sentences.en: There was a tinge of sadness in her voice.
sentences.cn: 她声音中流露出一丝忧伤.

sentences.en: There was a touch of sadness in his voice (= he sounded a little sad ) .
sentences.cn: 他的声音里含着一丝悲伤。

sentences.en: Why has such sadness been thrust upon us?
sentences.cn: 我们为什么要遭这份罪？

words.tran_cn: 难过的；悲哀的，令人悲痛的；凄惨的，阴郁的（形容颜色）

trans.tran_cn: 悲哀，忧伤，忧愁，悲哀，令人悲哀或忧伤的事物，愁眉苦脸，心境恶劣，心情恶劣，认真
